aow-events.name: aow-events
aow-events.desc: Information on current and upcoming events

result.clan-hunting-start: Commanders, a new round of Clan Hunting has started! Fight the mighty Manticore for nice rewards for everyone in your clan!
result.championship-cup-start: Commanders, season {SEASON NUMBER} of Championship Cup has just started! Remember to do 10 battles for participation rewards.
result.arena-last-day: Commanders, the end of Arena season {SEASON NUMBER} is upon us. May you have a glorious and victorious day!
